EmailTemplate.name: Draft Agreement Task Not Completed
EmailTemplate.subject: Draft Agreement Task Not Completed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Booking__c.Primary_Applicant_Name_Formulla__c},
You have received the Draft Agreement for Sale for your booking {!Booking__c.Name} of {!Booking__c.Unit_Number__c} in {!Booking__c.Project_Name_Formulla__c}.
Please consider this as a final intimition to verify all the details as mentioned in the Agreement pertianing to your apartment.
In case of request for change in any detail, please respond within the ext 24 hours; otherwise the details as mentioned therein shall be considered as duly approved by you.
Thankyou. Dynamix
